moves.1. e4 e6 2. d4 d5: the French defense: always good for breakfast..
moves.3. exd5 Qxd5 4. c4: this Black Queen is clearly on some mission...
moves.4... Qe4+ 5. Be3 Bb4+ 6. Nc3 Bd7 7. Bd3: Black is not getting anywhere soon...
moves.8. Nf3 Nf6 9. O-O Bd6 10. c5: like taking candy, from a child...
moves.10... Be7 11. Ne5: Black resigned: his Queen is caught...

gameName: fiercequeen, getting off in the morning (part 1)
